titleStmt.title: Batman vppon Bartholome his booke De proprietatibus rerum, newly corrected, enlarged and amended: with such additions as are requisite, vnto euery seuerall booke: taken foorth of the most approued authors, the like heretofore not translated in English. Profitable for all estates, as well for the benefite of the mind as the bodie. 1582.
De proprietatibus rerum. English
titleStmt.author: Bartholomaeus, Anglicus, 13th cent.
Trevisa, John, d. 1402.
Batman, Stephen, d. 1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Thomas East, dwelling by Paules wharfe,

notesStmt.note: Translated by John Trevisa; edited and revised by Stephen Batman.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
